lemma (in Gromov_hyperbolic_space_geodesic) quasi_convex_projection_small_gaps': assumes "continuous_on {a..(b::real)} f" "a \<le> b" "quasiconvex C G" "\<And>x. x \<in> {a..b} \<Longrightarrow> p x \<in> proj_set (f x) G" "delta > deltaG(TYPE('a))" "d \<in> {4 * delta + 2 * C..dist (p a) (p b)}" shows "\<exists>t \<in> {a..b}. dist (p b) (p t) \<in> {d - 4 * delta - 2 * C .. d} \<and> (\<forall>s \<in> {t..b}. dist (p b) (p s) \<le> d)"
